display_name: Total Duration of Apnea and Hypopnea (Supine): Apneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation + hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation during artifact-free estimated sleep in supine position from type IV home sleep apnea test
description: Apnea and hypopnea events were not distinguished as separate event types during scoring. Both were classified as a respiratory event that required a 50% reduction in Nasal Flow signal for at least 10 seconds.
